title: Volume 17, Number 2
summary: The newsletter covers updates on Paid FMLA issues, proposed legislation related to public fire protection and water/sewage agreements, labor rights regarding background checks under the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA), and safety standards following emergencies.
compressed_content: Update on Paid FMLA issues and their legal implications. Proposed Legislative Bills: Public Fire Protection and Interlocal Agreements. Labor Concept Updates: Consumer Credit Checks and the Fair Chance Act. Safety Bill Highlights: Post-emergency Monitoring Requirements.
search_text: Volume 17, Number 2. Update on Paid FMLA issues. Proposed Legislative Bills: Public Fire Protection and Interlocal Agreements. Labor Concept Updates: Consumer Credit Checks and the Fair Chance Act. Safety Bill Highlights: Post-emergency Monitoring Requirements.
